卑之，毋甚高論.pinyin: bei1 zhi1 , wu2 shen4 gao1 lun4
卑之，毋甚高論.definition: my opinion, nothing very involved (idiom, humble expression); my humble point is a familiar opinion; what I say is really nothing out of the ordinary

卑之，無甚高論.pinyin: bei1 zhi1 , wu2 shen4 gao1 lun4
卑之，無甚高論.definition: my opinion, nothing very involved (idiom, humble expression); my humble point is a familiar opinion; what I say is really nothing out of the ordinary

卑卑不足道.definition: to be too petty or insignificant to mention; to not be worth mentioning (idiom)

卑南.definition: Beinan or Peinan township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

卑南族.definition: puyuma, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

卑南鄉.definition: Beinan or Peinan township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

卑詩.definition: British Columbia, province of Canada (loanword from "BC")

卑躬屈節.definition: to bow and scrape; to act servilely

卑躬屈膝.definition: to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning; bending and scraping to curry favor

卑鄙齷齪.definition: sordid and contemptible (idiom); vile and repulsive (esp. character or action)

卑陋齷齪.definition: sordid and contemptible (idiom); vile and repulsive (esp. character or action)
